nodes.text: This individual was a superintendent at a Mandalorian school in the New Mandalorians' capital city of Sundari on the planet Mandalore.

The man got involved with a Moogan smuggling ring that delivered supplies to Mandalore during the Clone Wars. He felt the New Mandalorian government had given the school too little funds and was promised some of the earnings by the smugglers. Although he admitted to the connection when caught by a task force led by Satine Kryze and Padmé Amidala, he had no idea the tea he had helped distribute contained toxins.
The Superintendent is voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, who also voices Tee Va in the same episode as well as the clone troopers.
